Executive director of KEDO leaves
   Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The executive director of the KEDO (Korean Peninsula Energy Development Organization) and his party left here today after visiting the DPRK in connection with the light water reactor project.

articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's works published in Mexico
    Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il's famous works "Socialism Is a Science" and "the Worker's Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" were published in pamphlet by the Mexican Worker's Party Publishing House on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the Worker's Party of Korea.
